content: this pattern is not for sale/resale you may sell only the finished product but you must credit the gussied up goose for the design this pattern was designed for a standard sized porch goose 23 inches tall this pattern includes the hat the neck body tail the wings eyes and spots this pattern has not been tested yet please send any issues directly to me what you will need yarn medium weight yarn in black white and yellow hooks 5mm h 5 5 mm i scissors for cutting the yarn needle for sewing and weaving in ends stitches you should know sts stitches slip knot chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet twice into one stitch decrease single_crochet 2 together half_double_crochet half_double_crochet plus it s increases and decreases double_crochet double_crochet plus its increases and decreases treble_crochet treble_crochet fphdc front post half_double_crochet magic_ring or any alternative to create a circle
